input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), 16 oz, Glass

Product keywords:
Exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience
16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages
The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table
Sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion
Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended
Lead-free
Curvy shape with narrow stems
Product description:

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware is a set of 4 glasses that are created for a lifetime of enjoyment. The exquisitely designed glasses have a classic shape and narrow stems that are perfect for any occasion. The 16-ounce capacity glasses are made of lead-free glass and can be safely used in the dishwasher or hand-washed. The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware is ideal for serving any type of cold drinks and is sure to impress your guests.
input_text.Response B:
With their unique design and slender stems, the Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware set of 4 brings elegance and charm to the table. The classic design is exquisitely designed to fit the most prestigious audience. Each glass has a 16-ounce capacity, perfect for all beverages. The curved shape and narrow stems make it easy to hold and drink, and the lead-free glass is dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup.

But we recommend you wash these gorgeous glasses by hand to preserve their beauty. Whether you're hosting a party or just having a few friends over, these glasses are the perfect way to serve your favorite beverages. So why wait? Add the Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware to your cart today and elevate your drinkware game!

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is a bit robotic. Response B sounds mroe interesting.
